data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: There are three houses on my street. My ____ is ____ and ____, ____ a ____ flower ____. A ____ old ____ lives ____ the ____ green ____. A family with two children and a dog lives in the big white house.
data.partBlankContent: There are three houses on my street. My ho___ is sm___ and r__, wi__ a lit___ flower gar___. A ni__ old m__ lives i_ the lit___ green ho___. A family with two children and a dog lives in the big white house.
data.fullContent: There are three houses on my street. My house is small and red, with a little flower garden. A nice old man lives in the little green house. A family with two children and a dog lives in the big white house.
data.answer: 在我居住的街道上有三幢房子。我的房子是小的红色的，有一个小花园。一个善良的老人住在小绿房子里。一个有两个孩子和一只狗的家庭住在白色的大房子里。
